locals.title: Joe Mercer - Designer and Developer
locals.name: Joe Mercer
locals.cover:
and joe mercer
is my name
and coding
is my game
and getting hired
is my aim
and dreaming
locals.about: I study mathematics at the University of Waterloo in Canada. When I'm not studying I'm usually asleep, but somtimes in between the two I find some time to run or go to the gym. In high school
